experience_details.responsibilities: Spearheaded Agile delivery for multi-module platforms; led a 36-member Agile team for JPMC’s Trade platform (SALT UI); previously managed a 27-member team for ExxonMobil-Fiserv fintech app development. Scrum Master & Agile Program Leadership; client and team engagement; incident & asset management; onboarding & billing; documentation & compliance per SEPG, ISO 27001, and GDPR.

Led the Experience Center development for Shell Komatsu at their largest industrial lubricants warehouse in Nagpur; directed cloud kitchen concept for Conscious Food increasing margins from 5-7% to 8-12%; oversaw EDM design and quality checks to strengthen RedHat’s brand.
ERP workflow design and administration; supply chain oversight; Oracle NetSuite utilization to boost efficiency and stakeholder monitoring.
